org.apache.spark.streaming.receiver

Class ReceiverSupervisor

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.streaming.receiver.ReceiverSupervisor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReceiverSupervisorImpl

    public abstract class ReceiverSupervisor
extends Object
implements Logging
    Abstract class that is responsible for supervising a Receiver in the worker. It provides all the necessary interfaces for handling the data received by the receiver.
